doc.after: The Russian Federation is recognized in international law as a successor state of the former Soviet Union 21 Russia continues to implement the international commitments of the USSR and has assumed the USSR s permanent seat in the UN Security Council membership in other international organisations the rights and obligations under international treaties and property and debts Russia has a multifaceted foreign policy As of 2009 it maintains diplomatic relations with 191 countries and has 144 embassies The foreign policy is determined by the President and implemented by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Russia 112
